transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello, good afternoon, who is speaking?

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Ji bataiye, ji bataiye.

Executive: Sir very good afternoon, main Aasim Khan bol raha tha indiamart.com se business manager, aapki company register hai na IndiaMART ke sath mein sir.

Customer: Haan, haan, haan.

Executive: To abhi aapne call kiya tha na sir hamare customer care ke number 96969696 par, to jo aapka account dekhte hai na, unka business manager baat kar raha tha sir.

Customer: Ji, ji, ji.

Executive: Bataiye sir, main aapki kya help kar sakta hu?

Customer: Maine sir call nahi kara hai, ki ya to father ne kara hoga, mere 9782 number se mention hai, maine nahi kara.

Executive: Ye sir last mein 974 kiska number hai sir?

Customer: 969 wala to mera hi number hai sir.

Executive: Last mein 974 jiske hai, last mein 974.

Customer: 974 wala father ka hi number hai sir.

Executive: Usse call kar lijiye. Achha ji, theek hai, theek hai, main karta hu. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says he did not call.

- Wants to know whose number ends with 974.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the number belongs to customer's father.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call from his father's number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- verification, call, account
